scripts.build:theme: node build/bin/gen-cssfile && gulp build --gulpfile components/theme-chalk/gulpfile.js && cp-cli components/theme-chalk/lib lib/theme-chalk
scripts.build:utils: cross-env BABEL_ENV=utils babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/index.js
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf components/*/lib && rimraf test/**/coverage
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:file && webpack --config build/webpack.conf.js && webpack --config build/webpack.common.js && webpack --config build/webpack.component.js && npm run build:utils && npm run build:theme
scripts.examples:build: cd examples/pangoo-design-example && npm run build && cd .. && cd pangoo-design-example-ts && npm run build
scripts.examples:install: cd examples/pangoo-design-example && yarn install && cd .. && cd pangoo-design-example-ts && yarn install
